channel.title: BattleScape
channel.description:
[B]Error connecting to server.[/B]
I cannot find where to change the Port in the BattleScape Client Files.
I have this
[QUOTE]socketStream = new RSSocket(this, openSocket(43594 + portOff));[/QUOTE]
Which mean it should connect to my Server, The Server and Client are both on Port: 43594.
RuneLocus status says my server is [COLOR="Lime"]Online[/COLOR]

item.title: BattleScape
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Fire-Cape, post:1, topic:347624”]Error connecting to server.

I cannot find where to change the Port in the BattleScape Client Files.

I have this

socketStream = new RSSocket(this, openSocket(43594 + portOff));

Which mean it should connect to my Server, The Server and Client are both on Port: 43594.

google status says my server is [COLOR=“Lime”]Online[/COLOR][/quote]

Remove the “+ portOff” so all that is within the () is the port. Its the noobiest anti-leech I have ever seen. Then again, he does like to toy with your mind

Read full topic

find 127.0.0.1 or localhost and put your ip
